mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Lathrop, Sylvanus
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Lathrop, Sylvanus Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound left side abdominal [parites?] revolver bullet entered one and one half inches: anterior inferior anteior spinous process of ilium passing through left illae [word illegible] to exist posteriorly between border of illium and 3 lumber vertabrae. . Location Wounded: Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/19. Nature of Wound: Revolver bullet. Result: Furloughed 1864/12/17. Cured and returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lathrop, Sylvanus
